meanings.sent1: The unbraced shelf collapsed under the weight of the books.
meanings.sent2: The unbraced structure was unable to withstand the strong winds.
meanings.sent3: The unbraced chair decided to take a break and collapsed dramatically.
meanings.sent4: Her unbraced confidence wavered in the face of criticism.
meanings.sent5: The unbraced bridge swayed dangerously with each passing car.

meanings.sent1: The unbraced team struggled during the last-minute match.
meanings.sent2: She felt unbraced for the unexpected test that was announced.
meanings.sent3: His unbraced lunchbox contained only a single cookie.
meanings.sent4: The unbraced student forgot his homework at home.
meanings.sent5: The unbraced traveler realized he forgot his passport at home.

meanings.sent1: The unbraced door swung open with a creak in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The unbraced window rattled loudly during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The unbraced necklace slipped off her neck and fell to the ground.
meanings.sent4: His unbraced shoelaces caused him to trip and fall.
meanings.sent5: The unbraced gate banged noisily in the breeze.
